attributes.additional_details:
We need to allow hospital's to be able to enforce "Smoke Free" Policies on their sites or find a way to provide smoking provisions for visitors, patients and staff who do smoke.

This is particularly crucial to MKGH where smokers continue to smoke under the Neo Natal Unit despite signs specifically stating the babies are above them.

Hospital Chiefs need to be made aware that this IS an important issue and take accountability for it which in turn requires government backing.
